info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 10:02AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Caribou, north central Bannock, northeastern Power and south central Bingham Counties through 1030 AM MDT... At 1001 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chubbuck, or near Pocatello, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pocatello, Chubbuck, Fort Hall Mount Putnam, Fort Hall Townsite and Fort Hall Putnam Lodge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
